channel.title: **New Project** info inside
channel.description:
Alright i want to start a new project to make a good runescape private server.
i want to have ALL working minigames. i want to make the experience for the player to be fun and make them want to come back. i want the leveling to be a challenge but not too hard still easy and fun to rank up. im looking to create a good economy. i want this server to be about both PvPers and Skillers that way everyone can be happy.
Now im going to need everybody.
If you would like to join please fill out this application and paste it here OR pm me with it OR send it to me on MSN(xxmus1cxxlife@hotmail.com)<---my MSN
Name:
Age:
Experience:
group you would like to work in:
Best form of contact:
Comments/suggestions:
Thanks
